name: Corona Blossom Vol.2 The Truth From Beyond
description: Breaking news! Space pirate-turned-maid Lily and her cohort Yunie have a nefarious plan to kidnap R-ne and sell her as raw materials! Can Keiji and our other heroes save the day, or is R-ne destined to be melted into scrap? And is there an even greater threat looming in the background?
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM320MB, 1280×720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher
recommended_requirements: OS: Vista/7/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 DUO 2.66GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: VRAM512MB, 1280×720 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Support for PCM playback through DirectSound Additional Notes: Windows Media Player 9 equivalent or higher

reviews.review_text: I still want to touch R-ne's butt.

I am suprised with this Visual Novel. It has better story then most Vn's as I said in the previous review, but it is also filled with fan service. so its is and overall good Vn, I would suggest buying this, but not unless you bought the first volume. Or else you wont understand anything that happens in this Volume.
